Receptor Subtypes: AMPA (GluA1, GluA2, GluA3, GluA4), NMDA (GluN1, GluN2A, GluN2B, GluN2C, GluN2D), Kainate (GluK1, GluK2, GluK3, GluK4, GluK5), mGluR1, mGluR2, mGluR3, mGluR4, mGluR5, mGluR6, mGluR7, mGluR8
Nicotinic (α1, α2, α3, α4, α5, α6, α7, α9, α10, β1, β2, β3, β4), Muscarinic (M1, M2, M3, M4, M5)
α1 (α1A, α1B, α1D), α2 (α2A, α2B, α2C), β1, β2, β3
NPY (Y1, Y2, Y4, Y5), CRF1, CRF2, Oxytocin, Vasopressin (V1A, V1B, V2)
